item.title: Basics of Amazon VPC and Subnets
item.description: Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) is a private data center within the AWS infrastructure. You are able to decide the range of network IPv4 address range when you create the VPC. There is no way to change your VPC’s network block after it has been created. A VPC consists of many components. A few that will be highlighted in this article are: subnets, Internet Gateway, NAT Gateway, Route Table, and Network Access List.
